items.name: init(x: Double, y: Double, z: Double)
items.desc: Creates an acceleration structure with the specified values.

items.name: var x: Double
items.desc: The acceleration measurement along the x-axis, in multiples of earth’s gravity.

items.name: var y: Double
items.desc: The acceleration measurement along the y-axis, in multiples of earth’s gravity.

items.name: var z: Double
items.desc: The acceleration measurement along the z-axis, in multiples of earth’s gravity.
